member.name: INHERITED_FROMA
member.summary: The INHERITED_FROM structure provides information about an object's inherited access control entry (ACE).

member.name: INHERITED_FROMA.GenerationGap
member.summary: Number of levels, or generations, between the object and the ancestor. Set this to zero for an explicit ACE. If the ancestor cannot be determined for the inherited ACE, set this member to –1.

member.name: INHERITED_FROMA.AncestorName
member.summary: Name of the ancestor from which the ACE was inherited. For an explicit ACE, set this to NULL.

member.name: INHERITED_FROMA.GenerationGap
member.summary: Number of levels, or generations, between the object and the ancestor. Set this to zero for an explicit ACE. If the ancestor cannot be determined for the inherited ACE, set this member to –1.

member.name: INHERITED_FROMA.AncestorName
member.summary: Name of the ancestor from which the ACE was inherited. For an explicit ACE, set this to NULL.
